agent_diff:
diff --git a/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.py b/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.py
index b35efc3c21..e57ca043aa 100644
--- a/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.py
+++ b/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.py
@@ -323,6 +323,17 @@ class UsesStringizedAnnotations:
         return self
 
 
+class BadStringized:
+    def __new__(cls, *args: Any, **kwargs: Any) -> "BadStringized":  # PYI034
+        ...
+
+    def __enter__(self) -> "BadStringized":  # PYI034
+        ...
+
+    async def __aenter__(self) -> "BadStringized":  # PYI034
+        ...
+
+
 class NonGeneric1(tuple):
     def __new__(cls: type[NonGeneric1], *args, **kwargs) -> NonGeneric1: ...
     def __enter__(self: NonGeneric1) -> NonGeneric1: ...
diff --git a/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.pyi b/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.pyi
index b22f76798b..5185c4e3a1 100644
--- a/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.pyi
+++ b/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.pyi
@@ -217,6 +217,12 @@ class UsesStringizedAnnotations:
     def __iadd__(self, other: "UsesStringizedAnnotations") -> "typing.Self": ...
 
 
+class BadStringized:
+    def __new__(cls, *args: Any, **kwargs: Any) -> "BadStringized": ...  # PYI034
+    def __enter__(self) -> "BadStringized": ...  # PYI034
+    async def __aenter__(self) -> "BadStringized": ...  # PYI034
+
+
 class NonGeneric1(tuple):
     def __new__(cls: type[NonGeneric1], *args, **kwargs) -> NonGeneric1: ...
     def __enter__(self: NonGeneric1) -> NonGeneric1: ...
diff --git a/crates/ruff_linter/src/rules/flake8_pyi/rules/non_self_return_type.rs b/crates/ruff_linter/src/rules/flake8_pyi/rules/non_self_return_type.rs
index d3b2f75b2d..745526da22 100644
--- a/crates/ruff_linter/src/rules/flake8_pyi/rules/non_self_return_type.rs
+++ b/crates/ruff_linter/src/rules/flake8_pyi/rules/non_self_return_type.rs
@@ -182,7 +182,7 @@ pub(crate) fn non_self_return_type(
 
     if is_async {
         if name == "__aenter__"
-            && is_name(returns, &class_def.name)
+            && is_name_or_stringized_name(returns, &class_def.name, checker)
             && !is_final(&class_def.decorator_list, semantic)
         {
             add_diagnostic(checker, stmt, returns, class_def, name);
@@ -198,7 +198,7 @@ pub(crate) fn non_self_return_type(
         return;
     }
 
-    if is_name(returns, &class_def.name) {
+    if is_name_or_stringized_name(returns, &class_def.name, checker) {
         if matches!(name, "__enter__" | "__new__") && !is_final(&class_def.decorator_list, semantic)
         {
             add_diagnostic(checker, stmt, returns, class_def, name);
@@ -327,6 +327,12 @@ fn is_name(expr: &ast::Expr, name: &str) -> bool {
     id.as_str() == name
 }
 
+/// Return `true` if the given expression resolves to the given name,
+/// handling both plain and stringized (forward reference) annotations.
+fn is_name_or_stringized_name(expr: &ast::Expr, name: &str, checker: &Checker) -> bool {
+    checker.match_maybe_stringized_annotation(expr, |expr| is_name(expr, name))
+}
+
 /// Return `true` if the given expression resolves to `typing.Self`.
 fn is_self(expr: &ast::Expr, checker: &Checker) -> bool {
     checker.match_maybe_stringized_annotation(expr, |expr| {

ground_truth_diff:
diff --git a/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.py b/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.py
index b35efc3c21..37ad3d3706 100644
--- a/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.py
+++ b/crates/ruff_linter/resources/test/fixtures/flake8_pyi/PYI034.py
@@ -385,3 +385,10 @@ class MetaclassInWhichSelfCannotBeUsed7(django.db.models.base.ModelBase):
 class MetaclassInWhichSelfCannotBeUsed8(django.db.models.base.ModelBase):
     def __new__(cls, name: builtins.str, bases: tuple, attributes: dict, /, **kw) -> MetaclassInWhichSelfCannotBeUsed8:
         ...
+
+
+class UsesStringizedForwardReferences:
+    def __new__(cls) -> "UsesStringizedForwardReferences": ...       # PYI034
+    def __enter__(self) -> "UsesStringizedForwardReferences": ...    # PYI034
+    async def __aenter__(self) -> "UsesStringizedForwardReferences": ...  # PYI034
+    def __iadd__(self, other) -> "UsesStringizedForwardReferences": ...  # PYI034
diff --git a/crates/ruff_linter/src/rules/flake8_pyi/rules/non_self_return_type.rs b/crates/ruff_linter/src/rules/flake8_pyi/rules/non_self_return_type.rs
index d3b2f75b2d..e74363a446 100644
--- a/crates/ruff_linter/src/rules/flake8_pyi/rules/non_self_return_type.rs
+++ b/crates/ruff_linter/src/rules/flake8_pyi/rules/non_self_return_type.rs
@@ -182,7 +182,7 @@ pub(crate) fn non_self_return_type(
 
     if is_async {
         if name == "__aenter__"
-            && is_name(returns, &class_def.name)
+            && is_name_or_stringized_name(returns, &class_def.name, checker)
             && !is_final(&class_def.decorator_list, semantic)
         {
             add_diagnostic(checker, stmt, returns, class_def, name);
@@ -198,7 +198,7 @@ pub(crate) fn non_self_return_type(
         return;
     }
 
-    if is_name(returns, &class_def.name) {
+    if is_name_or_stringized_name(returns, &class_def.name, checker) {
         if matches!(name, "__enter__" | "__new__") && !is_final(&class_def.decorator_list, semantic)
         {
             add_diagnostic(checker, stmt, returns, class_def, name);
@@ -327,6 +327,11 @@ fn is_name(expr: &ast::Expr, name: &str) -> bool {
     id.as_str() == name
 }
 
+/// Return `true` if the given expression resolves to the given name,
+fn is_name_or_stringized_name(expr: &ast::Expr, name: &str, checker: &Checker) -> bool {
+    checker.match_maybe_stringized_annotation(expr, |expr| is_name(expr, name))
+}
+
 /// Return `true` if the given expression resolves to `typing.Self`.
 fn is_self(expr: &ast::Expr, checker: &Checker) -> bool {
     checker.match_maybe_stringized_annotation(expr, |expr| {
